biotools.summary: Tools developed to aid in the identification of mass spectrum that allow the calculation of mass values with isotopic distributions based on molecular formulas, peptides/proteins, DNA/RNA, carbohydrate sequences or combinations thereof.  A viewer for visualizing results is also available.

bioschemas.name: ISOTOPICA
bioschemas.summary: Tools developed to aid in the identification of mass spectrum that allow the calculation of mass values with isotopic distributions based on molecular formulas, peptides/proteins, DNA/RNA, carbohydrate sequences or combinations thereof.  A viewer for visualizing results is also available.
